cards.name: Attack Mode
cards.description:
Retain.
Gain 2 (3) Strength.
Lose 2 (3) Dexterity.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description:
Cycle if Dexterity < 0.
Gain 5 (8) Block.

cards.name: Defense Mode
cards.description:
Retain.
Gain 2 (3) Dexterity.
Lose 2 (3) Strength.

cards.name: Heated Defend
cards.description:
OVERHEAT: < 5 (10) >
Cycle if Dexterity < 0.
Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Heated Strike
cards.description:
OVERHEAT: < 5 (10) >
Cycle if Strength < 0.
Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description:
Cycle if Strength < 0.
Deal 6 (9) damage.

cards.name: Accumulate
cards.description:
Deal 13 (17) damage.
Make a copy of a non-rare card in your draw pile.

cards.name: Analyze
cards.description: Next turn, gain [E]  and draw 2 (3)  more cards.

cards.name: Anticipate
cards.description: Next turn, gain 11 (14) Block.

cards.name: Autoturret
cards.description: When a card cycles, deal 1 (2) damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Backfire
cards.description:
Take 5 (4) damage.
Deal 16 (19) damage.

cards.name: Boost
cards.description:
Deal 2 (4) damage.
Gain 2 (4) Block.

cards.name: Cluster Mines
cards.description:
Deal 4 (5) damage to a random enemy 3 times.
Whenever your Block is broken, this card costs 0 until played.

cards.name: Create Cores
cards.description:
OVERHEAT: < 10 (15) >
Shuffle 3 random Cores into your draw pile.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Fierce Bash
cards.description:
Deal 9 (12) damage.
Hits twice if the enemy doesn't intend to attack or defend.

cards.name: Flammable Fog
cards.description:
OVERHEAT: < 5 >
Gain 5 (7) Block.
Gain 5 (7) Block next turn.

cards.name: Focused Beam
cards.description:
Deal 9 (12) damage.
Put this on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Forcefield
cards.description:
(Innate. ) Retain.
Gain 6 (8) Block.

cards.name: Heavy Bolt
cards.description:
Deal 15 (19) damage.
Discard 2 random cards, then draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Mode Shift
cards.description:
Swap your Strength and Dexterity.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Phosphor Storm
cards.description:
OVERHEAT: < 5 >
Deal 7 (9) damage twice.

cards.name: Reinforce
cards.description: Gain 3 Block 2 (3) times.

cards.name: Rollout
cards.description:
OVERHEAT: < 10 (15) >
Deal damage equal to 3 times the number of cards that have Cycled this turn.

cards.name: Save State
cards.description:
Retain your hand this turn.
 (Draw 1 card.)
Exhaust.

cards.name: Scrap Cannon
cards.description:
Deal 9 (12) damage.
Exhaust 1 card.

cards.name: Shift Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 (7) damage.
Gain 1 (2) Strength.
Lose 1 (2) Dexterity.

cards.name: Suppressive Fire
cards.description:
Deal 5 (7) damage to ALL enemies.
Gain 1 Blur.

cards.name: Sweep Laser
cards.description: Deal 4 (6) damage, then deal 4 (6) damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Syphon Strike
cards.description:
Deal 7 (10) damage.
Whenever the enemy takes attack damage this turn, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Vent Steam
cards.description:
Exhaust 1 card.
Apply 1 (2) Weak and
1 (2) Vulnerable.

cards.name: Versatility
cards.description: If the target intends to attack, gain 7 (10) Block. Otherwise, deal 7 (10) damage.

cards.name: Agitation
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Whenever a card Overheats, gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Antimatter
cards.description:
Reduce your [E] to 0.
Deal damage equal to 4 (5) times the number of cards in your hand.

cards.name: Backup
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Choose a non-rare card from your hand. Add 2 copies on top of your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Battery Acid
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E]  ( [E] ) .
Shuffle 1 Slimed into your draw pile.

cards.name: Blazing Speed
cards.description:
OVERHEAT: < 5 >
Deal 3 damage.
Draw 2 (3) cards.

cards.name: Chainstrike
cards.description: Deal 5 damage, then play a (2) random Attack (Attacks) from your draw pile on the same target.

cards.name: Charge Shot
cards.description: Retain. Deal 5 (7) damage, plus 5 (7) for each turn this was retained.

cards.name: Crippling Shot
cards.description:
Deal 0 (3) damage.
If this dealt unblocked damage, apply 99 Weak. Exhaust.

cards.name: Critical Hit
cards.description:
Cycle unless an enemy is Weak or Vulnerable.
Deal 14 (18) damage.

cards.name: Dampening
cards.description:
Cards cannot Cycle until the end of your next turn.
Gain 4 Block.
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).

cards.name: Disrupt
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Enemy loses 2 (3) Strength for the rest of this turn.

cards.name: Electric Armor
cards.description:
Cycle if Dexterity < 1.
When an enemy attacks you this turn, it takes damage equal to your Dexterity.

cards.name: Electrocute
cards.description:
Deal 22 (26) damage.
Target loses 5 (7) Strength for the rest of this turn.

cards.name: Enhance
cards.description: Each turn, Upgrade a (2) random card (cards) in your discard pile for this combat.

cards.name: Failsafe
cards.description: The first 2 (3) Status cards you draw each turn Cycle.

cards.name: Flak Barrage
cards.description:
(Cycle if Strength < 1.)
Deal 0 damage to a random enemy 4 times.

cards.name: Flame Core
cards.description:
Cycle. When cycled:
A random enemy takes 3 damage. (Put a Flame Core into your discard pile.)

cards.name: Flash Freeze
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Cards cannot Overheat for the next 2 (3) turns.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Force Core
cards.description:
Cycle. When cycled:
Gain 1 Strength until the end of this turn. (Put a Force Core into your discard pile.)

cards.name: Guard Core
cards.description:
Cycle. When cycled:
Gain 2 Block. (Put a Guard Core into your discard pile.)

cards.name: Hard Reboot
cards.description:
Exhaust your hand.
Draw 3 (5) cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hazardproof
cards.description:
Gain 2 (5) Block.
Gain 1 Artifact.

cards.name: Impenetrable
cards.description:
Gain 25 Block.
Gain [E]  ( [E] ) next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Implosion
cards.description: Put ALL Burns from your exhaust pile into your hand. For each, play a random card from your draw pile.

cards.name: Isolate
cards.description:
Cycle if there's more than one enemy.
Your next (attacks) attack (deal) ~~- deals  -~~ double damage this turn.

cards.name: Laser Core
cards.description:
Cycle. When cycled:
ALL enemies
take 2 damage. (Put a Laser Core into your discard pile.)

cards.name: Metal Shell
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block.
Gain 2 (3) Plated Armor.

cards.name: Missile
cards.description:
Cycle if already played this combat.
Deal 15 (19) damage.
Apply 2 Weak and 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Molten Smash
cards.description:
Gain 15 (18) Block.
Deal 15 (18) damage.
Replace the cards to the left and right of this with Burns for this combat.

cards.name: Nuclear Core
cards.description:
OVERHEAT: < 10 >
Cycle. When cycled:
Apply 2 Poison to ALL enemies. (Put a Nuclear Core into your discard pile.)

cards.name: Oil Spill
cards.description:
OVERHEAT: < 5 >
Whenever a Burn hits you, target enemy takes 9 (11) damage.

cards.name: Omega Cannon
cards.description:
Deal 15 (20) damage.
Costs 1 less [E] for each Strength you have.

cards.name: One-Way Mirror
cards.description:
Gain 12 (14) Block. 
Apply 2 (3) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Overcharge
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain [R] and add a Burn to your hand.

cards.name: Overclock
cards.description: At the start of your turn, draw 2 cards and add a Burn to your hand.

cards.name: Point Defense
cards.description:
When a card cycles, gain 1 Block.
Works 5 (10) times per turn.

cards.name: Power Up
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
ALL of your basic Strikes and Defends gain 2 (3) power for this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Quick Attack
cards.description:
Deal 3 (5) damage.
Gain 2 (3) Dexterity.
At the end of your turn, lose 2 (3) Dexterity.

cards.name: Reactive Shield
cards.description:
(Innate.)
When you gain Block, deal 3 (4) damage to the lowest-HP enemy.

cards.name: Scope Core
cards.description:
Cycle. When cycled:
A random enemy gains 1 Vulnerable. (Put a Scope Core into your discard pile.)

cards.name: Shift Guard
cards.description:
Gain 5 (6) Block.
Gain 1 (2) Dexterity.
Lose 1 (2) Strength.

cards.name: Stasis
cards.description:
Exhaust a card.
Next time you play this, add 1 (2) Mega-upgraded copy (copies) of that card to your hand.

cards.name: Synchronize
cards.description:
(Innate.)
When you draw 2 of the same card in a row, deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Tumble
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.
For each one that cycles, deal 3 (5) damage.

cards.name: Unbalancing Blast
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Deal 10 (12) damage.
Swap your draw pile and discard pile.

cards.name: Zapper
cards.description: When you gain Strength or Dexterity, deal 3 damage to a random enemy. It loses 1 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Afterburners
cards.description:
Shuffle 3 (2) Burns into your draw pile.
This turn, your next non-rare card is played 3 times.

cards.name: Battery Core
cards.description:
Cycle. When cycled:
A card in your hand costs 1 less this turn. (Put a Battery Core into your discard pile.)

cards.name: Bunker
cards.description: When a card is Retained, gain 2 (3) Block.

cards.name: Clockwork Egg
cards.description:
Draw (Add) (Gain) (Gain)  (an Attack Mode+ and )  (a) (all 3 Egg relics and ) a card. (Defense) (card) (Clockwork) Exhaust (Mode+ to your hand) (Exhaust) (Phoenix).
Can be Upgraded 3 (2) (3) (Permanently) more times.

cards.name: Dark Flames
cards.description:
For each Burn in your exhaust pile, deal 3 damage and gain [E].
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Gatling Gun
cards.description: Deal 3 (4) damage to a random enemy 2 X times.

cards.name: Golden Bullet
cards.description:
Lose 20 (15) gold.
Deal 18 (22) damage.

cards.name: Hammer Down
cards.description:
Deal 12 (16) damage.
Double your Strength and Dexterity.

cards.name: Hasty Repair
cards.description:
Heal 12 (16) HP.
Lose 2 Max HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hyper Beam
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
Deal 50 damage.
Put 2 Dazed on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Long-Range Lance
cards.description: At the start of the next combat, deal 12 (16) damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Mass Production
cards.description: Choose a non-rare card in your draw pile. Exhaust your hand and replace it with copies of that card. Exhaust.

cards.name: Meltdown
cards.description: At the start of your turn, deal 12 (14) damage to ALL enemies and add a Burn to your hand.

cards.name: Memory Tap
cards.description: Add a random  (Upgraded ) red, green, and blue card to your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Multistage
cards.description:
Exhaust an Attack of cost X or less.
At the start of your next 2 (3) turns, play a copy of that card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Panic Fire
cards.description: When a non-upgraded card cycles, Exhaust it and deal 8 (12) damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Reserves
cards.description:
Cycle if HP > 20 (30).
Gain [R] [R] [R].
Draw 3 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Shield Burst
cards.description:
Lose all your Block.
Deal one (2) ~~- and a half  -~~ times that much damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Shield Generator
cards.description:
Gain 4 Blur.
Gain 2 (1) Vulnerable.

cards.name: Shifting Stance
cards.description: Every time you play 3 (2) cards, swap your Strength and Dexterity.

cards.name: Siege Form
cards.description: After you play a card, gain 2 (3) Strength until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Spin Drive
cards.description:
When you play a card, draw a card.
Works 3 times per turn.

cards.name: Sunburst
cards.description:
Exhaust ALL Status cards and replace them with random cards. Those cards cost 0 this combat.
Exhaust.

relics.name: Cogwheel
relics.description: Gain 1 Artifact at the start of each combat.
relics.flavorText: A piece of old machinery, carefully preserved.

relics.name: Master Core
relics.description: At the start of combat, shuffle 3 random Cores into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: A core stolen from one of the Guardians. Summons other cores to your aid.

relics.name: Foam Finger
relics.description: For the first 3 turns of each combat, draw 1 additional card at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: Always useful when you need a helping hand.

relics.name: Mega Battery
relics.description: Upon pick up, Mega-upgrade a random Construct card.
relics.flavorText: Developed by gremlin inventors in an attempt to create a self-aware robot. It did not go well.

relics.name: Bool Horns
relics.description: At the start of each combat, deal 3 damage to a random enemy. Upon entering a non-combat space, double the damage this relic deals next combat.
relics.flavorText: Horns from a rarely-seen species. Bools are known to only show aggression towards those who speak lies.

relics.name: Purple Ember
relics.description: When you enter a Rest Site, your starting hand next combat is Mega-upgraded until the end of combat.
relics.flavorText: A ghostly, flickering flame. It seems to absorb the power of nearby fires.

relics.name: Rocket Booster
relics.description: When you defeat an Elite, Upgrade a random card.
relics.flavorText: It doesn't matter how weak your swing is when you're moving at 200 miles per hour.

relics.name: Challenger's Mark 1
relics.flavorText: The mark of one who chooses to undertake the Spire's toughest challenges.

relics.name: Challenger's Mark 2
relics.description:
Modes give +1/-1 & can't be copied.
Starter cards Overheat.
relics.flavorText: The mark of one who chooses to undertake the Spire's toughest challenges.

relics.name: Challenger's Mark 3
relics.description:
Modes give +1/-1 & can't be copied.
Starter cards Overheat.
Discard 50% of Retained cards.
relics.flavorText: The mark of one who chooses to undertake the Spire's toughest challenges.

relics.name: Challenger's Mark 4
relics.description:
Modes give +1/-1 & can't be copied.
Starter cards Overheat.
Discard 50% of Retained cards.
Burns are upgraded.
relics.flavorText: The mark of one who chooses to undertake the Spire's toughest challenges.

relics.name: Challenger's Mark 5
relics.description:
Modes give +1/-1 & can't be copied.
Starter cards Overheat.
Discard 50% of Retained cards.
Burns are upgraded.
Weaker cards.
relics.flavorText: The mark of one who chooses to undertake the Spire's toughest challenges.

relics.name: Clockwork Phoenix
relics.description: Your upgraded Construct cards can now be Mega-upgraded outside of combat.
relics.flavorText: An artificial being designed to imitate the real thing. Amazingly lifelike.

relics.name: EXTRA-Long-Range Lance
relics.description: At the start of the combat after the next one, deal -1 damage to a random enemy, then lose this relic.
relics.flavorText: Okay, you just launched this one randomly. But it's bound to hit something!

relics.name: Long-Range Lance
relics.description: At the start of the next combat, deal -1 damage to a random enemy, then lose this relic.
relics.flavorText: You hit exactly what you aimed at.

relics.name: Claw Grip
relics.description: At the end of each turn, Retain a random card. It costs 1 less [E] next turn.
relics.flavorText: An extendable arm used to grab hard-to-reach objects.

relics.name: Wedding Ring
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose 2 cards. Once per turn, after you play one of them, play the other one too.

relics.name: Ice Cubes
relics.description: Your cards cannot Overheat for the first 3 turns of combat.

potions.name: Shift Potion
potions.description: Swap your Strength and Dexterity. Draw 1 card.

potions.name: Mega Potion
potions.description: Mega-upgrade 1 random card in your hand for the rest of combat.

keywords.name: [#ff9900]overheat
keywords.description: When too many cards Cycle in one turn, transform this card into a Burn for this combat.

keywords.name: Blur
keywords.description: Your Block is carried over between turns.

keywords.name: Cores
keywords.description: Cores are cards that Cycle and apply a small bonus effect.

keywords.name: Cycle
keywords.description: When drawn, discard this and draw a new card. Only works once per turn.

keywords.name: Egg
keywords.description: Eggs are relics that automatically Upgrade cards when you acquire them.

keywords.name: Mega-upgrade
keywords.description: A second upgrade that makes Construct cards even more powerful.

keywords.name: Metallicize
keywords.description: Gain Block at the end of each turn.

keywords.name: Plated armor
keywords.description: Gain Block at the end of each turn. Reduced when you take unblocked damage.

keywords.name: Slimed
keywords.description: Slimed is a status card that costs [R] to exhaust.

mods.name: The Construct
mods.description:
New character - The Construct! 

RECENT CHANGES:
1.1.0
- Updated for StS 2.0.

v1.0.6
- ZHS localization update for Rocket Booster (Rita-B)

v1.0.5
- Localization for KOR (Wilde) and ZHS (Rita-B).
- Fixed crash with Long-Range Lance.
- Fixed rare crash with Overheat effects.
- Probably some other minor bugfixes. 

v1.0.4
- Shift Guard/Strike no longer Cycle in Challenge Mode.

v1.0.3
- Added Challenge Mode (1) to char select.
- Fix Save State not triggering Bunker.
- Power Up now deals more damage and Exhausts.
- Wedding Ring description now saves.
- Changed Challenge 3 (config options).


Thanks for playing the Construct! Please let Moocowsgomoo know on Steam, Discord, or GitHub if you have any feedback or bug reports!
